name: Sample ransomware incident
description: Received a ransom demand for 0.5 BTC that was negotiated and then paid
Loss of integrity due to encryption.
Received a ransom demand for 0.5 BTC.
Paid the ransom of $10,000 USD as roughly 0.346 BTC.

name: Negotiated Ransomware Payment
description: Update mail server from version 8.2 to 8.3.

name: Ransomware encrypted server and provided a message to the system administrator when they logged in advising they contact evil@decryptyourstuff.zip
Negotiation over Email
description: Ransomware distributors provide an email address to contact them to begin negotiations for payment.

name: A negotiation took place using FakeApp
Ransom Negotiation using Well Known App
description: Ransomware distributors provide a user's account or channel to negotiate payment with in real time over a well known chat application.

name: Ransom Payment using Cryptocurrency
description: Ransomware distributors provide a cryptocurrency address to accept a payment.
